comments: Sure, I can describe the experience of a PDF! A PDF, short for Portable Document Format, is a file format that allows you to view and share documents in a consistent and reliable way. It's like a digital paper that maintains the original formatting, fonts, and images, regardless of the device or operating system you use. PDFs are great for sharing important documents, like resumes, contracts, or reports, because they preserve the layout and can be easily opened by anyone with a PDF reader. It's

Great. I actually downloaded a pdf reader before this. But its problem was that it took too long to load up. I discovered this one and it's great. Although it bugs me a little with some ads but never with video ads. Only thing i ask is if you could make a dark mode available. Thanks to yall

I am really frustrated with the ads and the inability to dismiss them or to close out of the PDF program when we are finished. I need to figure out how my emails could be opened, viewed and printed before without this app. Very poor service.

I can download stuff to it but, then when I go and open the app to look at document to print, the app is totally froze up. I ha e no idea what to do now! I mean if I force stop the app, I risk losing all my documents from the last year I have in there! Rediculous!!

All these downloads were paid for thru justdice to boost their credibility don't buy it. There is free apps that work better and don't shove an ad in your face just for hitting the back button every time. And the sub is absurd. Most pdf apps would do a 1 time pay for extra feat. & don't flood it w/skippable ads. Even if other apps ask sub for extra feat. (that you don't necessarily need) it's a reasonable price. Do you feel good ripping people off who don't know any better about pdf/doc apps?

title: SHAREit: Transfer, Share Files
description:
It’s time to Share it!

Share files, apps, games, videos, photos, music, recordings, documents and more with the SHAREit file transfer app. As a super-fast and safe app to transfer big files, trusted by 2 billion+ users globally, SHAREit is the secure way to share files.

With SHAREit you can also download videos and photos directly with downloader, manage files on your phone with file manager. File transfers from Mobile to PC and vice versa are now faster and easier.

New function: when changing your phone, you can easily transfer contacts, apps, videos, photos, music, recordings, documents from an old phone to a new one through SHAREit's phone clone function.

It's super easy to use! And the best part? It's free!

🔥 Why you must use SHAREit, the #1 file share & data transfer app?

🚀 THE FASTEST FILE SHARING AND APP SHARING IN THE WORLD
With 200 times faster than Bluetooth, the highest speed goes up to 42MB/s. Share and receive files without any data consumption, transfer files without any quality loss.

🔒 HIGH PRIVACY & DATA SECURITY
We know privacy and data security are important, so we make sure they're protected in the best way while you enjoy your files transfer, for free. With SHAREit, you can quickly and securely send and share any file, anywhere in the world.

👍 POWERFUL CROSS-PLATFORM TRANSFERRING, SUPPORTS ALL TYPES OF FILES
Experience the best data-free file transferring and sharing app that offers cross-platform transferring, supports all types of files and makes your life easier. You don't have to worry about the size or type of data anymore because SHAREit helps you send large files without limitation across all your devices. Transfer: Apps, Games, Photos, Movies, Videos, Music, GIFs and Wallpapers with just one tap!

⬇️ FAST DOWNLOADER
Support downloading videos and photos. Easily download videos and photos directly to your device.

📀 INFINITE HD & SELECTIVE ONLINE VIDEOS
Watch unlimited high-definition videos find high-quality and fun new video content every time you open the app.

🎶 ELEGANT MUSIC PLAYER - AUDIO PLAYER
SHAREit Music Player is the best way to listen to your favorite songs. It's a powerful and user-friendly audio player that does much more than just play music.

📲 PHONE CLONE
Phone Clone (Smart Switch) is a very handy data migration function when you change phones. You can easily transfer contacts, apps, videos, photos, music, recordings, documents from old phone to new phone. Samsung, Transsion, Xiaomi, OPPO, vivo, Huawei, OnePlus, iPhone and other smartphones all support this function.

💙SHAREit features:
TRANSFER GAME APPS: A new PUBG One Click Transmission feature - within seconds transfer large game apps, without needing to download the game cache file.
DOWNLOADER: Save videos and photos from WhatsApp, Facebook and Instagram for free.
VIDEO TO MP3: Convert Video to Audio.
FILE MANAGER: Manage the biggest files, move files or delete them.

✨ More features:
Muslim Area: Reminding the Muslim users of prayer times through alarm clock notifications.
Safebox: Easily hiding and encrypting photos and videos you prefer others not to see.
PDF Conversion: Conversions between PDF and images.
Shop: An online shopping platform delivering a high-quality shopping experience for users.
Game: Mini games for user entertainment and leisure.
Cleaner: Scenario-based removal of junk files, app uninstallation, deletion of unhealthy or unnecessary photos and videos.block notifications from third-party apps set by the user and prompt the user to clean it up

❤️ Download SHAREit now, the perfect app to share and transfer files! If you like it, SHARE it with your friends! ❤️

Share, Watch & Play. All day. With SHAREit.

comments: Although the new AI photo thing is fun it seems to have slowed the app down. It gets stuck a lot and I've had to force stop it several times. Also, I miss the battery optimization and speed boost functions. The dark theme is gone as well. I'd like to see those things added back. I've also noticed for a long time now that the music player puts the wrong thumbnail picture on some of my music files. That's not a huge problem but it's a bug that still bugs me.

I downloaded this app to share and receive apps without it taking data and sure enough, it does its work. I took two stars just because when I have Internet, my lock screen is bombarded with thousands of inappropriate notifications but that can be fixed by turning off notifications from settings. But another thing is entering the app with Internet and the next thing you see is an inappropriate ad. Edit: I know we can do that, I just have a complain about the ads.

Love this app! Because you can transfer games or apps or even files on offline, but it's a little bit annoying because of the ads that will pop-up while im playing, sometimes i even clicked on it, it automatically installed on my phone which is called "shopee" and even sometimes they will show websites that's 18+ only. But that's okay I care about the transferring apps when offline or even files or apps or even songs, so I'd give it a 4, thanks for creating this app.

Hi, team SHAREit. I'm ask for Help! please help me to recover the cleaned SHAREit received files to this device. I thought it was secure because the files already saved in device and it was there! in so long time. But then, I did cleaned it to get more space in storage. Suddenly that files in the album were missing after some days, 🤕 Ouch! that's so terrible and disaster for 32GB lost files as I still remembered. Please help me to get it back❤️‍🩹 🥺 Tqia.

This app is downright trash. So many ads especially if your in the middle of doing something you have to stop and watch an ad from tic toc and gotta press the X multiple times to back out of the app then it takes you to the play store even though you pressed the X multiple times to get tic toc. Why!? What's worse is you can have multiple Gigabytes transferred and the fricken thing says lost connection then all that time you spent transferring is now all gone, gotta start all over. Don't download

title: Photo Lab Picture Editor & Art
description:
Join AI photo editor Photo Lab which allows you to edit photos with face filters for pictures, stylish photo effects and lots of pic art ideas. Fantastic face photo montage maker, photo frames, picture effects and filters are here for you to enjoy.

Neural Photo Art Styles
A new smart and quick way to turn any photo into an artwork — choose from over 50 pre-set styles and experience advanced photo editing with the emergence of ai photo styles. 

Photo frames
Whether you're aiming to accentuate a beloved memory or seeking to add a polished finish to your photo, our diverse collection of exquisite photo frames provides the ideal solution. Just choose one of our beautiful frames and add a final touch to your favorite picture.

Realistic photo effects
This photo editor offers a range of captivating photo effects that can transform ordinary images into extraordinary visual creations. By applying these effects, you can add depth and character to your photos, turning simple snapshots into stunning works of art.

Face photo montages
Swap face easily and turn yourself or your friend into a cartoon character, a doll or any other look. The most complicated photo montages are handled automatically by a face detection algorithm to create the most unusual selfies.

Photo background editor
Use this advanced picture editor to easily and quickly erase and change backgrounds of your selfie with many creative background templates.

Photo filters
You don't need a pro photo editor to add some style to your images. Use various photo filters such as 3d photo, cartoon, vintage, anime, black&white, oil painting and many more to create different moods and atmospheres in your photos.

Photo collages
Create a wonderful pic collage. Seamlessly combine multiple images to craft captivating visual narratives that tell a story beyond a single frame. 

Make your image look creative in seconds without using a professional picture editor and set it as a profile pic, share it to any social network or send a signed virtual postcard to friends.

Please note that Photo Lab is an Internet-based application. It helps us keep your devices' memory free from tons of resources required to create high-quality artworks of your photos.

Photo Lab as an ai photo editor offers everything you want to enhance your photo and add originality to your selfie. Bring your creativity to life and edit photos with our face filters and stylish photo effects.

comments: Requires credit card to use free trial. Update changed to 4 stars since Developer responded to my one star and offered a work around. It does leave Watermarks on your finished picture but to be able to try without having to add a credit card , advertising for them is a small price to pay. Now that I have used it a few times I am more inclined to purchase it to be able to use the Pro features.

Hello PhotoLab. I like this app and it serve the purpose. My issues are as follows: why doesn't the hairstyle choices involve those for black people? I'm black and I sometimes have fros, braids, cornrows. Those should be options too; more color choices are required such as those with black & white hair and colored tips. There should be options for wanting glasses on or off and we need some realistic body type filters too. Thank you.

Updated ! This app was a great application! Now, I have an upgraded membership that I can't take off,and this application has had numerous problems? Bugs ? I am always having to uninstall it and then reinstall it. Keep getting a message that says this about the constant freezing of the application! Just fix it! You are ripping me off, and I would uninstall this forever, but I am paying for the subscription. I just found out how to cancel my subscription! I'm not happy! Have emailed support.

Update: I don't care for whatever they did to the app. All it shows now is the same models over and over again. It's no longer seeing normal people playing with the app, and enjoying it. Plus now when it uses a image. It seems to more focus on negative parts of your appearance. It didn't even change when I changed to a similar picture. Very upsetting. Always loved this app. had it for years.

This is a good app, functionally. I was considering upgrading my trial but 2 problems: There isn't enough media for POC (9k+ options for paler folk vs 300 for darker is a major skin tone gap) and with no in-app photo/video editing, I can't overcome that. The second issue is the quality of the videos and the length. The videos show longer clips than what is downloaded. The quality is very blurry. Idk if that's because of the trial or what but it's pointless without higher quality and inclusion...

title: Don't Touch My Phone AntiTheft
description:
If you are seeking a phone security application to safeguard your device from unauthorized access and theft, congratulations! You have discovered Dont Touch My Phone, an anti theft app meticulously designed to ensure the safety of your phone.

By employing cutting-edge anti spy detector technology, this application can identify individuals who are attempting to steal your phone. Take pleasure in the tranquility of knowing that your mobile device is now fortified with an alarm sound and intruders alert that provide exceptional protection against intruders.

The key features of Dont Touch My Phone include:
💫 Variety of sound alerts to select from
💫 Easy activation and deactivation of phone alert
💫 Option to enable flash modes for the alarm: disco and SOS
💫 Customizable vibration patterns while the phone is ringing
💫 Ability to adjust the volume for the motion alarm
💫 Setting the duration for the intruders alert
💫 User-friendly interface that is intuitive and easy to navigate

🎁 Discover our sound options:
✅ Police siren
✅ Doorbell chiming
✅ Delightful baby laughter
✅ Alarm clock sounding
✅ Train bell ringing
✅ Whistle blowing
✅ Rooster crowing

💡 What sets Dont Touch My Phone apart?

🛡️ Detect thieves using the anti theft alarm
Once enabled, any touch on your phone triggers the automatic activation of the phone alarm. You have the flexibility to personalize flash modes, opting for either a disco flashlight or an SOS flash alert. Additionally, you can choose from three vibration modes - vibration, heartbeat, and ticktock - for when the phone rings. Adjust the volume and set the duration for the antitheft siren according to your preferences.

🛡️ Maintain the security of your phone's privacy
This application ensures the safeguarding of your device's privacy. By activating the alarm, unauthorized access to your phone is prevented. The security alarm provides comprehensive protection for all your private data, alleviating concerns when leaving your phone unattended on the sofa.

🛡️ Safeguard your phone against theft
Picture yourself traveling to a foreign country, where concerns of pickpocketing on the streets may arise. However, with this anti thief siren application, such worries will no longer trouble you. The app effectively protects your phone from pickpocketing through its motion alert system. It is designed to detect any attempts to touch your phone and promptly turn on alert to deter potential thieves.

🎗️ How does it operate?
Dont Touch My Phone - Alarm is extremely user-friendly. After downloading the app, you simply need to grant it the necessary permissions to function correctly, as outlined below:
1 - Select a preferred ringing sound.
2 - Customize the duration and adjust the volume.
2 - Choose flash modes and vibration settings.
4 - Apply the changes, return to the home screen, and tap to activate or deactivate the alert.

Utilizing this application offers a convenient method for safeguarding your phone against theft and intrusion. With the app's assistance, you can ensure that you never misplace your device. Experience enhanced phone security by giving Dont Touch My Phone a try today!

If you have any questions about the app, please leave us a comment. We will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for your support. 💖

2 - Customize the duration and adjust the volume.
2 - Choose flash modes and vibration settings.
4 - Apply the changes, return to the home screen, and tap to activate or deactivate the alert.

Utilizing this application offers a convenient method for safeguarding your phone against theft and intrusion. With the app's assistance, you can ensure that you never misplace your device. Experience enhanced phone security by giving Dont Touch My Phone a try today!

If you have any questions about the app, please leave us a comment. We will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for your support. 💖

title: SI Connect (SSH/WS/DNS)
description:
SI Connect is a versatile and powerful application that offers a complete solution for secure connections over SSH, WS and DNS protocols. With an intuitive and easy-to-use interface, SI Connect allows you to establish encrypted connections quickly and reliably, ensuring the privacy and security of your data.

With support for SSH, SI Connect allows you to securely connect to remote servers, whether for system management, file transfer or command execution. In addition, the application offers support for the WS (WebSocket) protocol, allowing you to establish persistent and bidirectional connections, ideal for real-time applications.

SI Connect also incorporates advanced DNS features, allowing you to easily create and manage custom records for your network configurations, giving you complete control over name resolution.

TapByte Net Proxy - Unleash the Power of the Internet
Welcome to TapByte Net Proxy, with our cutting-edge technology, we enable you to explore the digital world securely.

Absolute Privacy

TapByte Net Proxy is built with a strong commitment to your online privacy. We protect your data, so you can surf the internet securely.

High-Speed Connections

Say goodbye to a sluggish internet connection. TapByte Net Proxy offers high-speed VPN connections, allowing for smooth and uninterrupted browsing, streaming, and downloading. We ensure that you get the fastest possible connection, no matter where you are.

User-Friendly Interface

TapByte Net Proxy is designed with simplicity and ease of use in mind. Just tap to connect to the desired server - it's as simple as that! Our intuitive interface ensures a seamless and hassle-free user experience.

Secure Public Wi-Fi

Public Wi-Fi networks can be a breeding ground for cyber threats. TapByte Net Proxy transforms insecure public Wi-Fi into a secure private connection, protecting you from potential cyber-attacks while you're on the go.We do not keep any records of your online activities, so you can browse with peace of mind knowing that your privacy is always our top priority.

Download TapByte Net Proxy Today!

Join the TapByte Net Proxy community and revolutionize the way you surf the internet.

title: Bolt: Request a Ride
description:
Use your smartphone to order a ride, get picked up by a nearby driver, and enjoy a low-cost trip to your destination.

Why choose Bolt? 
• Get a comfortable, low-cost ride.
• Fast arrival times, 24/7.
• See the price of your ride before you order.
• You can pay inside the app (Credit/Debit/Apple Pay).

Easily request a ride with the Bolt app:
1. Open the app and set your destination;
2. Request a driver to pick you up;
3. See your driver's location on the real-time map;
4. Enjoy the ride to your destination;
5. Leave a rating and pay.

Bolt features that require the app to stay running in the background:

• SOS button. In case of an incident, the user can easily provide their live location to a safety provider to get help faster.
• Trip audio recording. Users have the ability to record the trip audio if they feel unsafe or are facing a complicated situation. This audio can be used as evidence for investigations by the authorities.
• VoIP calls. Users can utilise in-app calls for communication to help locate each other or if a passenger forgets something in the car, for example.

Bolt is available in 45 countries and 500 cities around the world.

Our mission is to make cities for people, not cars. We're doing this by bringing fast, reliable, and affordable forms of transport to millions of people around the world, while also helping millions of drivers support their families. The next time you need a ride, take a Bolt!

Earn money driving with the Bolt Driver app. Sign up at https://partners.bolt.eu

Questions? Get in touch via info@bolt.eu or at https://bolt.eu

Follow us on social media for updates, discounts and offers!

Facebook — https://www.facebook.com/Bolt/
Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/bolt
Twitter — https://twitter.com/Boltapp

recentChanges:
Thanks for using Bolt!

We regularly update the app to provide a consistently high-quality experience. Each update includes improvements in speed and reliability. Check out the latest updates in the app!

Enjoying Bolt? Please leave a rating! Your feedback helps us improve.
comments: I have suggestions. Have in mind that I use Bolt 2-wheels on a daily basis. 1 - There is no way to extend or renew a pass. I buy the monthly pass and I have to either wait the days to pass or consume 100% of my pass balance to then buy a new one. 2 - 99% of the time the app crashes when I hit END RIDE button. I always have to close the app and reopen it to end my ride. 3 - The menu doesn't always show the button for Scooter and e-bike pass, I have to turn on the GPS and Data in order to see it.

You must fix the GPS picking up location to be Greatly accurate because the location we choose to be picked up as clients are not the exact same as the drivers see and you need to be allowing the driver to see exactly where we are as we see the car location when coming, so they can be coming to pick us up from the location we are. It will be greatly easier and save us all!;)

Don't search for a quote until you're ready to book IMMEDIATELY. If you search twice the price will go up. Once I searched a third time out of curiosity and the quote didn't go up a second time, but then when I went to book it shot up by 100% due to 'high demand'. I assure you that it was not a busy period and no other apps/firms I checked with reflected this. I've also had multiple drivers cancel in a row for the same trip, which triggers the price increase above and wastes a lot of time.

Sometimes Bolt app substitutes the name of a well-known location (eg Main Railway Station) with a wrong address that is not even visible in the app. So you end up being dropped somewhere around but not at the entrance to a building as expected. But they don't want to fix it, advising instead to check pin on the map, tell the driver where exactly you need to go etc. Taking additional steps on a user side doesn't improve user experience. Especially disappointing as before it worked normally.

This app is useful but very dangerous. They give the drivers your real phone number, not a connecting number like other rideshare apps. They can and will call you later, especially if you're a woman. If you have a dispute or they try to extort you during your ride, they have your real number so they can harass you and find you later. Drivers can cancel the ride after they've picked you up and without telling you. That's happened several times. Other comments are accurate.

title: MyDStv
description:
Take control of your VIEWING experience from your trusted premium ENTERTAINMENT COMPANY with the MyDStv App today. Have a peace of mind knowing that you are in control! 

The MyDStv App is an easy and convenient way to MANAGE your DStv account, FIX ERRORS, PAY online, CHANGE PACKAGES, UPDATE your details all from one place. 

Wait, there’s more…Get access to the latest NEWS FROM AROUND THE WORLD, SPORTS GAMES TODAY and MOVIES NOW! because we’ve also created a clever way for you to gain access to DStv Now, ShowMax and BoxOffice. Now you can keep track of MOVIES, SHOWTIMES, NEWS ALERTS and ARTICLES with ease! Anytime, Anywhere ... 

WITH THE MYDSTV APP, YOU CAN:

• Check your balance: View how much you owe or have, pay your bills and always stay connected.
• Manage your account: This feature helps you manage your personal info, privacy settings, upload a profile photo and so much more.
• Upgrade or Downgrade Package: You are in control, satisfy your entertainment needs by exploring our DStv ENTERTAINMENT PACKAGE CHANNELS.
• Privacy & Security: Your personal information is yours, so with this feature we help protect your information and details, all it takes is just a single click to switch this feature on. Login to your accounts and manage your viewing remotely with the comfort of knowing your information is safe. 
• Retrieve details: You can easily recover your Smartcard number if you have forgotten it by using the App.
• Fix Errors: Which Error code is on your screen? Easily fix common errors on your DStv decoder to stay watching. What’s even better is that you don’t need to login onto the App to fix errors on your decoder.

Now that’s convenience on another level...

MyDStv - It’s your account, on your terms! 
Great ENTERTAINMENT, DAILY NEWS, KIDS MOVIES and your favourite SPORTS GAMES for you and your entire family.
 
(Not available in SA, only the rest of Africa)

title: All Document Reader - One Read
description:
Want to quickly open all formats of files on your phone with just ONE app anytime, anywhere?

Try All Document Reader! This all-in-one file viewer is perfectly compatible with all Office files, helping you easily process files in all formats, such as PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLXS, PPT, TXT, etc. It can automatically scan the files on your phone, organize them in one place into corresponding folders so that you can search and view them conveniently. 

👉Designed by Simple Design, the leading app development team on Google Play, this simple, free, and lightweight PDF viewer/Excel viewer/Docx reader is really worth a try!

📚 Full Featured Document Manager
- Folder structure view: easily view PDF, Word, Excel, PPT files, etc. in the corresponding folders.
- Easy to view: all documents are listed in one place for easy searching and viewing
- Favorites: you can add files to the Favorite list for quick opening
- Easy to search: easily search for files within or outside the app

📔 PDF Reader
- Fast open and view PDF files in "PDF files" Folder or from other apps.
- Zoom in or zoom out pages while viewing to get perfect visual effect
- Go to page: jump directly to the desired page
- Share and send PDF files to your friends with a single tap

🧐Word Viewer (DOC/DOCX)
- DOC/DOCX viewer
- A simple list of DOC, DOCS, and DOCX files
- Present all word documents on your phone in the best and fastest way
- Simple and elegant reading interface

📊 Excel Viewer (XLSX, XLS)
- Quickly open all excel spreadsheets
- XLSX, XLS formats are both supported
- A convenient tool to manage excel report on your phone 

🧑‍💻 PPT Viewer (PPT/PPTX)
- Excellent PPT/PPTX viewer app
- Present PPT files in high resolution with fast and stable performance

📝 TXT File Reader
- Easily read txt files anytime, anywhere with this powerful documents viewer.

👍 FEATURES
✔  Simple and easy to use
✔  Small size and lightweight (12mb)
✔  Sort by names, file size, last modified, last visited, etc
✔  Quick response
✔  No internet required
✔  Rename files, delete files, share files to your friends

🌟 FEATURES COMING SOON
✔  More file formats will be supported, such as RAR, MOBI, HTML, ODT, XML, DOT, ZIP, etc.
✔  File editor
✔  Image to PDF converter
✔  Create new documents
✔  Merge documents
✔  Search text in all documents
✔  Dark mode
✔  Doodle on documents
...

If you don't have time to sit in front of your computer to manage your files, you can use All Document Reader. It allows you to read documents on your phone anywhere, anytime. All formats supported!

We will keep working hard to optimize the app and improve the user experience. Please feel free to contact us at allreaderfeedback@gmail.com if you have any suggestions. 💗

All document viewer
Want a simple all document viewer? You can view, edit and share all documents (pdf, excel, word, ppt, txt) anytime with this app. Use all document viewer to easily work with even the most complex documents.

All documents reader
All documents reader is also a powerful editor. With just one click, all documents reader makes it easy to improve your work efficiency! Try all document reader now to organize your documents!

All document viewer and reader
All document viewer and reader is a powerful and simple tool in your life. This all document viewer and reader brings you an efficient and high-quality work and learning experience!

All-in-one file reader
Are you looking for an all-in-one file reader? Why not try this file reader? It can not only view but edit and manage your documents easily.

File manager
File manager is a practical office tool. With this perfect file manager, you will keep everything organized!

Practical office reader
Office reader is a professional application. It is fast, powerful, and easy to use. Office reader will make you work more brilliantly.

comments: The best document reader app I've ever found but there's 1 thing that I didn't like: When I keep my finger on the screen a little bit too much, it gets into edit mode which prevents me from scrolling. You can just put an edit button on the top bar or add an option in settings to choose how we want to activate edit mode so people who likes this feature can still use it. Haven't seen any ads but if there are popup ads you can make it appear at the bottom so we can use the app without being annoyed

I've been using this app for years and very content with it. But, along with the new recent update, I guess I have to uninstall this now cause the ads is so annoying. I don't want the ads just to watch video. I don't mind the short ads before playing the videos, but I dislike the pop-up ads that appear whenever I pause my playing video. Will use other app that's free, without the pop-up ads. Thanks for the experience!

The app is a very fast PDF reader, even for large PDFs. It can read Word documents but will not preserve formatting. The default file list shows all documents in your phone in one list, and does not preserve the folder layout (which is what I use to organize my documents). It displays documents it can't read. Most concerning, it wants access to ALL your documents and accesses your Google Drives without asking permission. Privacy nightmare. I will be uninstalling. Too bad, PDFs were fast.

The app is fantastic as is! The only thing I want to see are the features from the PDF reader implemented, such as merge and split PDF. Basic text editing for DOCX and PDFs would be fantastic too but not necessary. This app gets the job done in a very user friendly way. Big thank you to the Devs for making such a nice and user friendly app.

The app is good, supports almost all document types, but it doesn't let us select or copy content from the documents, which I believe is the most basic feature of a doc reader. This thing is really annoying and a hassle in productivity, kindly resolve this with an update. Update: So, I was trying to copy text from the word & excel files. But as you're saying that copying is only possible in pdf documents, so I guess the most used one is word file, so you can first implement copying in that.

title: Sofascore - Sports live scores
description:
The most powerful sports app for live scores and football scores, results and stats. And not just football – choose from more than 20+ sports, 5000+ leagues and tournaments, millions of events and many esports competitions. 

Analyze almost any live score and statistics on the planet. Join millions of Sofascore users and see why this is the only sports app you will ever need! ⚽🏀🏒🎾🏐🏏🏈

Sofascore offers much more than just simple sports stats:

✔   The fastest and precise notifications with instant, flash scores and results
✔   All the live scores and fixtures from Premier League and other top leagues
✔   Be the first to find out who scored a goal and get detailed stats on players and other sports events
✔   All transfers, player strengths and weaknesses for a complete overview of a player’s performance in a season

Enjoy unique Sofascore features that add a new dimension to sports results:

STATISTICAL RATINGS  - over 300 stats that make one live number used by professional players, news sites and analysts

ATTRIBUTE OVERVIEW  - graphical representation of five key players’ attributes to quickly find out how complete a certain player is

ATTACK MOMENTUM  -  a unique graph that reflects match dynamics and the intensity of pressure of each team

HEATMAP  - visually representation of player’s movement on the pitch for every match and the entire season 

BASKETBALL SCORE GRAPH - a live graph showing which team is in the lead and with the peaks showing how big the lead is 

SHOT MAP – see instantly the positions basketball players shoot from during a match, with made and missed shots

PLAYERS AVERAGE POSITIONS - check positions based on the actions of a certain football player

The app allows you to track all leagues and competitions in a wide range of sports:

Football (Soccer), Basketball, Ice Hockey, Tennis, Motorsport (Formula Live timing, MotoGP, Superbike, Nascar, Rally, DTM), Cricket, Baseball, Rugby, American Football, MMA (UFC, KSW, PFL, Bellator), Handball, Volleyball, Cycling, Waterpolo, Futsal, Aussie Rules, Snooker, Darts, Badminton, Floorball, Bandy, Table tennis and Beach Volleyball.

In addition to all mentioned sports, you can follow tournaments from the USA, like Major League Soccer - MLS, North American League, NBA, WNBA, US Open Cup, NFL, College Football, MLB, NHL, AHL.

Welcome to the new era of MMA ultimate fighting coverage! 

Get live strikes and kicks overviews, detailed fighter profiles, and a unique rundown of the hottest MMA organizations in the world. 

Sofascore covers:

•	Top organizations (UFC, KSW, PFL, Bellator and more)
•	Fighter profiles 
•	Fight night info
•	Highlights 
•	MMA schedule
•	MMA live results

Dive deep into live MMA stats with Sofascore.

Download the app today and become a sports expert instantly!

*Sofascore app is optimized for Android Wear OS smartwatches.

comments: For a long time this was and is the best football and sports app there is. The updates just kept on getting better, the exception being the 'play areas' hues in dark mode. However the last update is letting ads popping up between the matches instead of at the bottom of the screen. They pop up, make the app go Slower (no joke they slow down the app) and you sometimes accidentally click on it because it popped up in the place where your match just was. This is beyond annoying, please fix it!

To test the app for improvement,i reinstalled it after the disappointment i had previously. As usual the main purpose is okay and delivers timely sports results.I did notice that it has some minor improvements in responsiveness, slightly faster, The UI is better even tho the font-style(NOT modern looking, too plain) and the dark mode(very poor). Moreover, needs to be customized to use fewer memory resources and data.

A friend recommended this to me and I've been loving it. Keeping up with my teams and the little graph they show to see how the attacks are going plus the dark mode colour hue on the team colours is really cool. However, I wish it wasn't as buggy. The same friend has this on IOS an his is butter, I just font understand why android has to get the bugs. Overall awesome app.

Definitely one of the best LiveScore apps, but there is an area I think needs update. After getting into a match for stats and everything, instead of getting you back to the league by which you selected the match, this app will send you way back to begin everything. It's so irritating and makes it difficult for me to analyze many matches. Someone should just tell me it isn't like that when you subscribe and right away, I'll do that. I hope it doesn't cost much to fix that for me. Thanks

I only follow Premier League, Championship, Champions league and Swedish football plus NHL and SHL, Sweden. And Swedish hockey isn't prioritised. That makes the app too large. Furthermore the live rating of players are pretty biased and not very accurate. Since the latest update I get a red notice telling me I have no Internet connection as soon as I'm not using WiFi. Pretty annoying.

title: Football Scoreboard-Live Score
description:
Your gateway to real-time excitement - Football Live Scores app where Every Goal Comes to Life!

Football Scoreboard-Live Score Football brings live Football scores, stats, Football Fixtures, comments, Football lineups, Football Squads, the latest all football leagues, and soccer news of the Football World that keeps you up to date anytime and anywhere.

Features of Football Scoreboard-Live Score Football:
•	World Live Football Scores during matches - Live sports scores
•	Football Live scores app with Match Details (Timeline, stats, tables, Football lineup, Football news)
•	Match Reminder for your favorite team
•	The commentary between live soccer results
•	Head 2 Head
•	Pressure Index: Which team is in more pressure?
•	Live Prediction: Who will win the match and support your team
•	Countries name below leagues
•	Latest Leagues Scoreboard about goal score
•	Information about Substitutions
•	Results, Football fixtures, and Football squads’ information – soccer news
•	Search your favorite Teams and players
•	Follow your Favorite Football clubs

Set personalized match alarms and notifications of your favorite leagues and goal scorers.
Follow your favorite teams, leagues, and players to never miss any Football match again with all Football scoreboards.

Live Soccer Results - Live Soccer scores:
Football leagues app to get the fastest updates on the latest live football scores. From live soccer scoreboards to your favorite football clubs and football leagues, this Football schedule app will provide you with every detail you need about the football live game – Soccer News.

World Football Live Scores - Football News:
Football scoreboard covers real-time Football results for live matches from over a hundred leagues in the world e.g., Champions League, Europa League, Premier League, Championship, FA Cup, Eredivisie, Bundesliga, La Liga, Super League, FIFA World Cup, etc. Football Results and updates offer to get a full overview of all the major football leagues - Scores alerts.

Soccer Scoreboard - live Soccer Scores:
Live football scores, goals, and Football fixtures updates to keep track. Stay notified as soon as the player hits the goal - Football World Cup.

Football score app - World Football Live Scores: 
The live sports Scores view your team’s upcoming fixtures, table standings, Live Football Score, football news, and player stats to check top scorers and more.

 How all Football Match Results Will Work - Football schedule app:
1.	Download the Live Football Scores app and it will show the Football Results screen on your Android.
2.	The Football Live Score app shows today’s football match and the one that is going to be live.
3.	Will show you an alarm icon in front of the matches from which you can set an alarm or match reminder of your favorite match with the Football scoreboard
4.	Clicking on the league, you will be able to see players in each team, match fixtures, stats, table, and Football lineup through the Scores alerts - flash score.
5.	With Football live scores, you can follow your favorite team and their match schedules.
6.	You can use the search feature to directly follow your favorite leagues.

 Goal Score - Live soccer scores:
During live soccer matches enjoy the live commentary and substitution information. The Goal Alert feature in the app will keep you updated with soccer news.

 All Football Scores:
Don’t miss out on key events in the match, Stay tuned to live scores and every second of the game. While using the football schedule app for Live Soccer results you also enjoy other cool features like football lineup, football Fixtures, stats, etc.

 Football World Cup Results:
Football Scoreboard-Live Score Football is a hub of football live scores, the latest teams & matches, commentary during matches, H2H, pressure index, stats, and much more.
Download it now!

title: Health Tracker
description:
Health Tracker is a powerful and user-friendly application. It's also a handy tool for overall healthy living.
Simply download and install the app on your mobile phone to start using it.

Key Features:
⭐1. Easily record blood pressure and blood sugar data
With a simple input interface, you can record your systolic, diastolic, pulse and blood glucose at any time and place. Easily edit, save or update your health data.

📈2. Analyze Long-term Trends with Health Charts
Visual charts helps you track your daily health status and monitor changes in blood pressure. 

💡3. Expand Your Knowledge about health
This app doesn't just track your health. Here, you will learn about accurate and practical knowledge to build healthy lifestyle.

Additional features :
🏃Pedometer: The built-in pedometer will record your daily movements. Maintain an active lifestyle!
💊Medication Reminder: Customize your medication reminders to ensure timely intake. Never miss a dose!
🥛Water Intake: Remind you to drink water regularly. A good water balance is essential for maintaining normal blood pressure！
🛌Tracking Sleep: Record your sleep time and provide you with soothing sleep-aiding music. Get quality sleep every day!
(these features need health and notification permissions)


Download our app now to start monitoring your health and improving your lifestyle! We believe it will be a valuable tool for you.

💡NOTE:
+ This app is designed to support the recording of indicators and cannot measure blood pressure or blood sugar levels.
+ The tips provided in the app are for reference purposes only.
+ This app uses the camera of your phone to capture the image and uses algorithms to recognize the heartbeat, the results may be biased.
+ Health Tracker cannot replace professional medical equipment.
+ If you have a medical condition or are worried about your heart condition, please consult a doctor promptly.

comments: I downloaded it to give it a try. The app said it helps keep track of medication as well. I don't see it must have to pay. Waaaay toooooo many ads. I couldn't even read the details about the subscription because adds popped up literally every 2 seconds. I think if fewer ads & medication were on for free, I would try. If I read it right, it was only $40.00 for life (one-time fee). If so, it's not too bad as long as ads stay gone for life as well. I will undownload and keep looking for now.

It is absolutely infuriating that a health app, which is designed to promote wellness and well-being, has chosen to inundate its users with numerous advertisements. This excessive amount of ads not only interrupts the user experience, but it also detracts from the purpose of the app itself. A health app should be a reliable and helpful tool for improving one's health, not a platform for advertisers to constantly push their products and services.

Awful. Absolute garbage. This had rendered my Huawei GT 3 pro watch unfunctional. The ap won't even connect to the watch anymore with your new version and the watch constantly asks to be connected to the point that it shows that message instead of the actual time. You claim you needed to make the ap like this to make revenue but the GT3 pro watch is $400! Really disrespectful to the people that believed this brand had high standards!

The app is foul. When you want to measure heart beat, it will say to touch the camera by your finger. At this point, you can be amazed but the reality is that when you locate the camera at any object it will also count the object's heart rate which is impossible.
Way too many ads!! One cannot do anything without having to watch an ad, every click activates a new advert, even exiting the app make you watch an ad!! Bloody ridiculous!! Im out!!

This app fully complies with API Terms of Service from all YouTube's social network services. You cannot download videos from YouTube's social network media nor playing them in the background. You can only download music from your personal Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, from public podcasts and from Whim under Creative Commons licenses.

comments: So far so good it hasn't had any problems or lagging up or slowing down. And it's been pretty easy to use and does not have so many complications. I had the AT player that was basically the same thing you can get music from YouTube but it froze up constantly, I mean it was good but this one is a lot more ads and pop-ups it got a little annoying and give the AT player maybe two star, not I'm saying anything bad that app it just doesn't need as many pop-up's, that's just my opinion well 2cent lol.

App is great so far, on a 3 day trial right now. You can search by song, artist, album and genre for some examples. And the add free is WONDERFUL, and well worth the small price I'm going to pay when the trial ends. The only let down I've had is that I've done a handful of searches in the "downloadable" music and have had very little luck finding much of anything I was looking for. But you still get 5 stars because your app is well made, and the totally fair prices make it a no brainer 👍

I really like this app, I use it lots in my day to day life and I like the online music tab when searching. The only downsides to this app that I have found are: when you go into playlists in the online music tab and click one with more then 5 songs it only gives 5 to choose from, the YouTube tab doesn't have that problem and the other problem (probably more of a preference) is that there's not much to choose from (there's ~20 songs then nothing) but it's a great app even with its problems.

Clarifying - 4.9 Stars! This is why....The app is good, I like it.......but.......would love to know how to download music to my own playlists that aren't within the app, or if that is even possible, (why the fifth star is missing from my review). Other than that, this app should be an example as to what a true music downloader should be! I've had, so far, a hella experience. If I could get some feedback from the app's producers, that would be great!

This is a great app. Just came across it and decided to get it. However, there's only 2 MAJOR things that I ask. That's 1st to be able to move our created playlists up and down invthe list, and to have them stay where we put them. 2nd, please list the number of created playlists that we have. Do these things and you'll get a glowing review, with 5 stars all the way.

title: Video Editor & Maker - InShot
description:
InShot - Powerful all-in-one Video Editor and Video Maker with professional features. Add music, text, transition effects for videos, make smooth slow motion, make video collage, blur background and etc! As an easy-to-use editing app, InShot makes creating vlogs a breeze and helps you to become an influencer on YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, WhatsApp, Facebook, etc.

InShot is also a photo editor and collage maker. Edit pictures and selfie, remove bg, add filters and adjust HSL, etc.

Features:

AI Tool
- AI Body Effects. Experience the magic of AI with instant presets that elevate your images and videos in just one tap.
- Auto Captions. AI-powered speech-to-text tool helps you say goodbye to manual text typing and makes video editing effortless.
- Auto Remove Background. Remove background of videos/photos at the touch of a button.
- Smart tracking. Make stickers/text move seamlessly in sync with your tracking object motion, adding dynamic flair to your videos.
- Smooth slow-mo. Experience seamless slow-motion effects for buttery smooth videos.

Full-featured Video editing
- Trim/Merge clips. Combine and compress video without losing quality.
- Reverse videos.
- Add text, emoji and InShot exclusive stickers.
- Add music, sound effects & voice-overs.
- Add various-styles voice effects.
- Adjust ratio. Fit your video and photo in any aspect ratio.
- Speed control. Speed up/slow down video. Add speed ramping.
- Keyframes editing. Add custome keyframe animations.
- Chromakey. Easily edit green screen video.
- Picture-in-Picture. Create multi-layered videos.
- Mixtures. Blend your video with blend mode.
- Color picker. Pick any color on the screen and apply it to the background/text.

Filters, Effects & Transitions
- Lots of cinematic filters.
- Adjust video brightness, contrast, saturation, etc. Customized video filters and video effects.
- Unique effects such as Glitch, Fade, Noise, Beats, Weather, Retro DV, celebrate, etc.
- AI effects. Clone, stroke, auto-blur, etc.
- Pro editing app with super transitions. Combine two clips with transition effects.

Photo Editor & Collage Maker
- Add background to your photos.
- Multiple ratios supported. Cute frame.
- 1000+ stickers, add funny memes to your photos.
- Easy-to-use photo grid collage maker. Create photo collages with stylish collage layouts.

Canvas & Background
- Various background patterns. And you can also upload your own pictures as a background.
- Adjust video ratios for Instagram/TikTok/Youtube post.

Easy to Share
- Custom video export resolution, HD pro video editor support 4K 60fps export.
- Share your daily life to others on social media. Instagram Reels, TikTok, Whatsapp status, YouTube Shorts, etc.

InShot is an editing app for videos and photos. With InShot - video maker with music, you can easily make basic video and even advanced assets like video collage, smooth slow motion, stop motion, reverse video and more. You can share your vlogs to social media to get more likes, or edit video with music and pic for TikTok.

Any questions for InShot (FREE slow motion video editor with music & photo slideshow maker)? Please contact us at inshot.android@inshot.com

For more new feature tutorials and advanced video editing tips, please subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@InShotApp

Disclaimer:
InShot is not affiliated, associated, sponsored, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter.

comments: InShot is a game-changer for mobile video editing. Its user-friendly interface, professional features, and affordable premium version make it a top choice. While it has some limitations like ads in the free version, its versatility and ease of use outweigh any drawbacks. Highly recommended for anyone looking to create impressive videos on the go.

The A.I. Captioning works flawlessly. It's accurate, it's perfectly timed to the dialogue, and it's really fast. Unbelievable. Would love the option to export the captions as a txt file. Even better the ability to add names during export if multiple people are talking. I'm not seeing the green screen option on Android though. Outside of that, perfect app.

Back to a 5*, as while the watermark addition initially had me annoyed, overall - since it can be removed via watching an ad anytime - I ultimately can live with it. As this is truly the best FREE editing app I've found on Android, to date. It's easy to decipher, especially for someone like me who knew nothing about editing beforehand, and surprisingly has a lot of great features accessible without spending. The load time can be a bit laggy, but overall, would definitely recommend 👍

I've been using [App Name] for editing my photos, and I'm thoroughly impressed! The range of editing tools and filters available is fantastic, allowing me to unleash my creativity and enhance my photos effortlessly. The interface is clean and easy to navigate, making the editing process enjoyable. Plus, the app's performance is smooth and reliable, ensuring a seamless experience every time. Highly recommended for anyone looking to take their photo editing skills to the next level!"

InShot is a game-changer for mobile video editing. With its user-friendly interface and powerful features, it's my top choice for on-the-go content creation. The app's versatility allows me to add music, text, and effects effortlessly. It runs smoothly, ensuring a glitch-free editing experience. Whether for social media or personal projects, InShot is my go-to app for quick and impressive edits.. it a very user friendly app

title: Flashlight : SMS & Call Alert
description:
🌟 Illuminate your phone experience with Flashlight: Call SMS & Call Alert ! 🌟

Welcome to the ultimate solution for never missing an incoming call, message, or notification again! Our Flashlight app, coupled with Flash Alert functionality, not only ensures you stay notified but also serves as a convenient source of light with its powerful Flashlight feature. Picture this: as soon as an incoming call, SMS message, or app notification arrives, your phone's flash blinks rhythmically, catching your attention with its unmistakable signal.

💥 Why Choose Our Flashlight App? Here's Why! 💥

■ Stay discreet in quiet environments like hospitals or meetings with Flashlight Alert on calls.
■ Cut through noisy surroundings, such as busy roads, with Flashlight Alert.
■ Utilize the Camera Flashlight to locate your phone in dark places, doubling as a handy compass.
■ Rely on the flashlight function as an effective alarm clock, ensuring even heavy sleepers wake up on time.
■ Keep track of important calls and SOS notifications effortlessly.
■ Enhance your nighttime reading sessions, find your way, or set the mood with a DJ-style flash at parties, all thanks to the bright flashlight.

💥 Features That Set Us Apart 💥

■ Flashlight Alert for incoming calls ensures you're always informed.
■ SMS messages trigger distinctive flash alerts.
■ Stay updated on notifications from social apps with Flashlight indicators.

❗ Enjoy Peace of Mind ❗

Rest assured, our app is designed to be light on your phone's battery and won't compromise its durability.

If you're tired of mundane flashlight apps and crave a more dynamic experience for your calls and messages, look no further than Illumination Flashlight Alert - Flash on Call - Flashlight App. With its array of innovative features, it's bound to elevate your smartphone experience and set you apart from the crowd.

💌Thank you for choosing our app. For any inquiries or feedback, reach out to us at flashlightsmscallalert.support@gmail.com. Let the laughter begin!

title: VLC for Android
description:
VLC media player is a free and open source cross-platform multimedia player that plays most multimedia files as well as discs, devices, and network streaming protocols.

This is the port of VLC media player to the Android™ platform. VLC for Android can play any video and audio files, as well as network streams, network shares and drives, and DVD ISOs, like the desktop version of VLC.

VLC for Android is a full audio player, with a complete database, an equalizer and filters, playing all weird audio formats.

VLC is intended for everyone, is totally free, has no ads, no in-app-purchases, no spying and is developed by passionate volunteers. All the source code is available for free.


Features
––––––––
VLC for Android™ plays most local video and audio files, as well as network streams (including adaptive streaming), DVD ISOs, like the desktop version of VLC. It also support disk shares.

All formats are supported, including MKV, MP4, AVI, MOV, Ogg, FLAC, TS, M2TS, Wv and AAC. All codecs are included with no separate downloads. It supports subtitles, Teletext and Closed Captions.

VLC for Android has a media library for audio and video files, and allows to browse folders directly.

VLC has support for multi-track audio and subtitles. It supports auto-rotation, aspect-ratio adjustments and gestures to control volume, brightness and seeking.

It also includes a widget for audio control, supports audio headsets control, cover art and a complete audio media library.


Permissions
––––––––––––
VLC for Android needs access to those categories:
• "Photos/Media/Files" to read your all media files :)
• "Storage" to read your all media files on SD cards :)
• "Other" to check network connections, change the volume, set the ringtone, run on Android TV and display the popup view, see below for details.

Permission Details :
• It needs "read the contents of your USB storage", in to order to read your media files on it.
• It needs "modify or delete the contents of your USB storage", in order to allow deletion of files and store subtitles.

• It needs "full network access", to open network and internet streams.
• It needs "prevent phone from sleeping" in order to prevent... your phone from sleeping when watching a video.
• It needs "change your audio settings", in order to change audio volume.
• It needs "modify system settings", in order to allow you to change your audio ringtone.
• It needs "view network connections" in order to monitor whether device is connected or not.
• It needs "draw over other apps" to start the custom picture-in-picture widget.
• It needs "control vibration" to give feedback on the controls.
• It needs "run at startup" to set recommendations on Android TV launcher screen, only used on Android TV devices.
• It needs "microphone" to provide voice search on Android TV devices, only asked on Android TV devices.

comments: The underlying code is very solid The interface is getting better. Now able to choose which folders to scan. Many people don't realize that this is not technically a video file player, it can decode video streams. So in order to display a thumbnail it needs to stream a bit of the file. I wish it had more of the transcode and convert features of the desktop version.

The only media player app that deserves download. Perfect for music, movies, and audiobooks. No ads and no grifting for micro-purchases. Has all the interface features that every other app obviously misses, such as easy skipping by intervals of time. Has a simple audio player with things like bookmarks, playback speed, sleep timer, equalizer etc. Has a complex video player with tons of customizable controls such as swiping or double tapping for volume, brightness, skipping etc. Use it.

Three main issues for me. First, VLC has a bad habit of not detecting changes to things like a song's album art, though usually there's a way to get it to work eventually. Second, there's no way to sort by composer, which is annoying as a classical music listener. Lastly, the app sorts by number as if they were just characters and not as the actual number (i.e. it sorts 1, 12, 15, 2, 20, 26, 3, 31, etc.)

Its great, ad free and does the job. Acquired taste for some, but im glad I downloaded it after trying other free options. No data sharing, competent player. The others spammed me with ads and honestly weren't super great either. By the way, a lot of old reviews are defunct now. Ie: one user complained about shuffle not being available after starting playing. Theres a shuffle button now.

Overall the app is good but there are few things that need to be fixed like 1) Whenever I sync the subtitles to the video ,the subtitles vanishes for few minutes. 2) Once the synced subtitles reappear ,if you skip the video for 10/20 sec the subtitles disappear for good then you have to delete and add it again I hope you guys will look into this.

comments: Good app, I didn't have my phone coming with a music app so I got this. It's cool how it scans and music and you can customise the details of the song; name, artist, folder etc. However, the app has a tendency of going to the previous song when you tap the left arrow button once. In other music players, this restarts the current song instead of going to the previous song, so you kind of have to open the app to restart the current song or toggle songs, that's my only problem. Otherwise great app.

Best music player available. My phone didn't come with a gallery app or music app, so I had to look through many apps to get the closest "android" feeling apps. This is the best one I've found so far and it plays all my music, while others have trouble playing my files. This one even plays high fidelity files too. It's great! Just put this on my new phone and it's still the best player available! I hope we can organize and modify albums/art on our pc for this like iTunes in the future!

This is an absolutely WONDERFUL app, I don't know what I'd do without it. You can import your own songs and listen offline without any ads that interrupt the audio- what more can you ask for! My only problem is that when I import songs to an album, they go alphabetically and not the order I import them in. I don't know if there's a button to fix this, but any help would greatly be appreciated.

Used to be a great app but now you get hit with full page ads that stop the music and any attempt to use the app at all. The tiktok ads won't stop even if you hit the "skip ad" button. I really like the app but I think I'll look for another app as the ads are a pain. EDIT: I would like to stress to Inc Shot that you CANNOT click a "x" or close button to stop the ads. There are no buttons to click. The ad popping up isn't the problem. Not being able to skip it or close it is the problem.

This is the best and most simple intuitive music player. Dropping it by one star. I paid for the full version because I enjoyed it so much and gave It a five-star review. However, sometimes when I open the app up instead of going directly to my music library it keeps prompting me to rate and review which I have already done. This is annoying especially when just want to play music.

comments: I am subscribed to GPT-4, I'm paying monthly, but even though I'm using WhisperAI and it works from time to time, sometimes when I dictate something to my microphone, it translates without a reason on other languages. Sometimes it just cancels out. They should definitely test it out because it works initially, but afterwards you will have a lot of headaches using your microphone and converting it into text. Once they fix it, I will change this review, but for now, it works in like 70% of cases.

Nice to have this as an assistant. But one thing that is a problem is *Real time updates* from the AI and also I would like a function where it can *speak* out the reply it sends me. Like if I send an English word that I want translated to French, it should give me the option to play the French word in audio format, thus I'd be able to pronounce the French word correctly. Otherwise it's a very useful FREE AI. Please update soon adding the above mentioned. Thank you.

The most amazing and useful technology since the release of the smart phone. Absolutely essential if you want to be connected with the collective knowledge of mankind. It'll expand your abilities in so many ways. My only suggestion I can think of at the moment is the ability to categorize your conversations into folders. It keeps track of your conversations, and you can go months back, as well as archive any conversation you want, but the ability to organize them would be great.

I stumbled across this and was impressed at the rather extensive coverage it provided when I typed in a complex and multifaceted question. But I didn't have much time to get into it beyond that. Today I discovered the text to speech capability and I literally carried on a conversation with it while driving home for nearly an hour in traffic. The time passed so quickly and I learned so much, it was like being mentored by your favorite teacher one on one after class. Still, there are some limits.

It's okay. Certainly works as something that you can bounce ideas off of. It has a bit of a tendency to forget important pieces of information and seems to lack the ability to look back through the chat history. It also has a weird habit of randomly downgrading ChatGPT 4 chats to ChatGPT 3.5 with no way to stop or reverse the change unless you want to start a new chat and give it the footnotes of what you were talking about and hope that it doesn't misunderstand anything you say.

title: App Lock - Lock Apps, Pattern
description:
App Lock is an application that can be used to lock other applications on your smartphone or tablet. Lock Apps is great for keeping your confidential information safe and secure. Our App Locker allows you to set a password to protect your apps. With App Lock, you can protect your apps and take pictures of any intruders that enter an incorrect password. Lock Apps is an app that helps you protect your privacy by locking your apps. With App locker, you can lock your social media apps, messages, calls, and more. This app lock provides all-round protection by detecting the installation of new apps. Through Lock Apps you can use multiple lock types, including PIN, pattern, password, and fingerprint. 

App Lock with perks: 

🛡️ Lock all Apps: App Lock can lock WhatsApp, Facebook, Messenger, Calls, Gmail, Play Store, etc. Keep your app data safe and secure and prevent unauthorized access with App Lock. 
🛡️ Use multiple lock types: It can use multiple lock types, including PIN, pattern, password, and fingerprint. 
🛡️ Intruder selfie: App Lock takes pictures of any intruders that enter an incorrect password. 

Lock apps  

🛡️ Are you looking for an App lock? Now, try our App lock, just click one time to lock all apps. 

Lock Types

🔐 PIN Lock:The App Lock supports you to lock apps with PIN
🔐 Fingerprint Lock: The app lock fingerprint will bring you an excellent experience.
🔐 Pattern Lock: You can create a complex app lock pattern for your apps.

App Locker is great for keeping your confidential information safe and secure. App Lock can also be used to lock down certain features of your device, such as the camera or the microphone. Our App Locker allows you to set a password to protect your apps. This way, you can keep your private information safe from prying eyes. If you forget your password, you can reset it using security questions.  

How App Locker Can Help You: 

🛎️ No more worrying about someone reading your private data! 

🛎️ No more worrying about your kids accidentally sending wrong messages, messing up system settings, or spending money on in-app purchases. 

🛎️ No more worrying about someone checking your social media apps, messages, calls, etc. 

🛎️ No more worrying about friends when they borrow your phone 

App lock comes with amazing features 

Lock new apps 🔒 

App Lock detects the installation of new apps and locks them in one click. Provide all-round protection. 

Lock setting 🔒⚙️ 

App locker locks your phone setting to prevent misuse of the phone to change the system settings! 

Advanced protection 👮 

App lock takes pictures of any intruders that enter an incorrect password. 

Password 🔑 

App locker support PIN, Pattern, Password, Fingerprint, 

Reset password 🔢 

With lock apps you can reset your password with security questions if you forget it. 

Uninstallation Prevention 

Nobody can uninstall App Lock without a password. 

App Lock with Custom Time: 
Do you want lock apps with Lock Delay? Please try this lock app. The lock app supports setting custom time for lock delay. You can lock applications in what you like to do. 

Lock Apps with Intruder selfie: 

This is a smart app locker that comes with Intruder selfie feature. You can find out who's trying to unlock your apps. Use the app locker freely. 

App locker is an locking app for Apps and gallery. With App lock, you can easily lock apps with different lock formats.  

Any questions for App Lock  
Please contact us at  
liveearthmaps@gmail.com

title: Color Phone Call Screen Theme
description:
Color Phone Call Screen Theme App is a personalized call screen for incoming calls with color phone screen. Make your call theme unique with color call theme, live wallpapers, cool call flash effects, ringtone,....

✨Color Phone features: Call screen themes?✨
🔥 10.000+ themes available for free with many different styles
🔥 22+ call screen themes including: Anime, Neon, Galaxy, Love, Hero, et
🔥 Theme options for each incoming call separately
🔥 Optional incoming call screen themes with videos, images and gifs available
🔥 50+ exciting new call button animation sets
🔥 Animated incoming call screen color effect
🔥 Preview call screen themes live with call screen

✨TOP FEATURES FOR COLOR PHONE CALL SCREEN THEME✨
🌈Colorful Call Theme
Endless phone call screen theme - color phone style such as love themes💖, nature themes🌳, cute themes (anime, naruto), animal🐱, neon, car, universe, landscape and many dynamic caller screen themes are made for you. 
• Unique color phone call button styles with dynamic call answer button, stylish calling icons.
• Avatar maker/funny memes, animations and color phone call screen background, font awesome.
• Unique dialer button themes for call keypad.

🎵Call Ringtone Maker
Color Phone Call Screen Theme App custom free ringtone songs to your personal taste for different contacts or groups by extracting the best part of your audio song from a custom gallery video file/music player and set caller tune. Set caller tune music for lover or best friends and family.

🔔LED Flash Alert 
Blinking call flashlight with vibration to remind for all incoming calls🌟 Color Phone Call Screen Theme help you answer any call quickly and avoid missing any important incoming calls or your phone call theme is on silent mode or in a dark environment with flash alert on incoming calls.

⚡EDGE Lighting Calling
Stunning edge lighting display for call notification with 3d theme, Neon lights and Neon LED lights.

🔎Caller ID Photo
Caller photo full screen: Identify who is calling you with an unknown call - Recognize the caller and make your phone call theme stand out.


How to use:
• Choose your preferred phone call themes directly from the app.
• Assign the selected phone call theme to a single contact or multiple contacts.
• Personalize further by adding your own call wallpapers from your gallery.
And now, you are ready to see the new incoming call theme with the most Stylish Call Theme - Color Phone Call Screen Theme App.


💌Thank you for choosing our app. Contact us: teammarketing@lutech.ltd

title: Avança : Empréstimos online
description:
Avança is an online credit lending platform located throughout Angola. It solves personal funds by applying for loans online anytime, anywhere, you can travel, shop and so on. This application provides us with a very safe and reliable way to obtain funds.

Product Description:
Loan amount: 30,000 Kz to 200,000 Kz
Loan term: 91 to 365 days
Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 15% – 26%
Commission rate (including VAT): 3% - 8%

For example: the loan amount is 30,000 Kz, the loan term is 120 days, the annual percentage rate (APR) is 26% and the commission rate (including VAT) is 6%, so the interest will be be 30,000 Kz*26% /365*120=2,564 Kz, the commission must be 30,000 Kz*5%= 1,800 Kz. The total amount payable is: 30,000+2,564+1,800=34,364 Kz

Loan requirements?
1. Any Angolan citizen over 18 years old
2. Have a valid ID and cell phone number
3. Have an IBAN account or PayPay AO account

Why choose Ança?
1. No credit report required, no mortgage required, loan up to 200,000 Kz
2. Get loans anytime, anywhere, 7/24, and the entire process is paperless and digital on your mobile phone.
3. After approval, pay directly to your IBAN or PayPay AO in 1 minute
4. As credit score improves, loan limit gradually increases
5. Various flexible and convenient refund methods

How to get a loan?
1. Download the Avança app through Google Play
2. Register using your mobile number
3. Fill in your basic information and loan application
4. Get approved instantly and receive money in minutes - deposited directly into your IBAN account or PayPay AO account

Privacy and permissions:
Ança uses data from your phone, including your information, to verify your identity and create a credit score, making it simple to obtain a personal loan. Avança ensures that your data is always protected on our secure servers and we will never provide your information to third parties without your permission. Privacy Policy: https://bat.avancanavida.co/avabpri/priavancy.html

Contact us:
We are always happy to hear from you!
Email: customer@avancanavida.co
Leave us a message via WhatsApp: +244 927945133
Company address: 298W+2X9, Estrada, Zango, Angola
descriptionHTML:
Avança is an online credit lending platform located throughout Angola. It solves personal funds by applying for loans online anytime, anywhere, you can travel, shop and so on. This application provides us with a very safe and reliable way to obtain funds.

Product Description:
Loan amount: 30,000 Kz to 200,000 Kz
Loan term: 91 to 365 days
Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 15% – 26%
Commission rate (including VAT): 3% - 8%

For example: the loan amount is 30,000 Kz, the loan term is 120 days, the annual percentage rate (APR) is 26% and the commission rate (including VAT) is 6%, so the interest will be be 30,000 Kz*26% /365*120=2,564 Kz, the commission must be 30,000 Kz*5%= 1,800 Kz. The total amount payable is: 30,000+2,564+1,800=34,364 Kz

Loan requirements?
1. Any Angolan citizen over 18 years old
2. Have a valid ID and cell phone number
3. Have an IBAN account or PayPay AO account

Why choose Ança?
1. No credit report required, no mortgage required, loan up to 200,000 Kz
2. Get loans anytime, anywhere, 7/24, and the entire process is paperless and digital on your mobile phone.
3. After approval, pay directly to your IBAN or PayPay AO in 1 minute
4. As credit score improves, loan limit gradually increases
5. Various flexible and convenient refund methods

How to get a loan?
1. Download the Avança app through Google Play
2. Register using your mobile number
3. Fill in your basic information and loan application
4. Get approved instantly and receive money in minutes - deposited directly into your IBAN account or PayPay AO account

Privacy and permissions:
Ança uses data from your phone, including your information, to verify your identity and create a credit score, making it simple to obtain a personal loan. Avança ensures that your data is always protected on our secure servers and we will never provide your information to third parties without your permission. Privacy Policy: https://bat.avancanavida.co/avabpri/priavancy.html

Contact us:
We are always happy to hear from you!
Email: customer@avancanavida.co
Leave us a message via WhatsApp: +244 927945133
Company address: 298W+2X9, Estrada, Zango, Angola

title: Made-in-China B2B Trade Online
description:
The Made-in-China.com App is a world leading wholesale mobile B2B marketplace for global trade. Buy products from quality Chinese suppliers all from your mobile device conveniently. 

3 STEPS to complete your transaction:
Search Products > Place Orders > Trade Safely
 
🔥 Shop What You Need
We provide safe and reliable online trading services. All transaction processes can be completed in our app. You can place an order and track your order anytime, anywhere.

🔥 Easy Sourcing
Source millions of new and innovative products from Verified Suppliers. 40,000,000 products from 27 categories are all for your purchase requirements. Now you can easily select and compare products.

🔥 Get Multiple Quotations
Post customized sourcing requests, you will receive price quotes in 24 hours. 
6,000,000 suppliers gathered here are trade agents, wholesalers, retailers, manufacturers and SMEs, fulfilling the demands from sellers on Amazon, eBay, wish, etsy, mercari, lazada and so on.

★ Keep in Touch
Send inquiries to get latest factory discounts or sample requests. Chat directly with suppliers by TradeMessenger system. You can make a voice call or video call to verify the supplier.  

★ Brand New Smart Expo
Hold various online exhibitions that simultaneous with major trade fairs from all over the world. No matter where you are, you can efficiently browse the virtual booths and start face-to-face online meetings with exhibitors at once.
 
★ Member Events
Organize diverse forms of member events on a regular basis. Semi-monthly live video streaming, celebration activities during festivals, events that open to everyone...... All is waiting for you!

★ Languages & Currencies Supported
The Made-in-China.com supports 16 popular languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Russian, Italian, German, Dutch, Arabic, Korean, Japanese, Hindi, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Indonesian. And 18 local currencies are now available.

Moreover
✓ Get most relevant recommendations based on your sourcing preferences.
✓ Share products and suppliers on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, etc.
✓ “Featured” channel helps you find trustworthy suppliers and high-quality products.

The Made-in-China.com App, a must-have app in global B2B trade!
DOWNLOAD NOW AND GROW YOUR BUSINESS!

title: UGO Angola
description:
Reserving a ride with UGO is now faster! Whether you need a car for business or personal use just download UGO application and make your booking in minutes.
The app tells you exactly how long your car will take to arrive.
App features:
- The easiest and fastest way to book a ride
- UGO cars cover all areas in Luanda.
- No need to type in your pick-up address - GPS system finds your current location
- Remembers recent addresses for faster repeat bookings
- Airport bookings
- Tells you how long your car will take to arrive
- Safe and flexible modes of payment: Multicaxa express, TPA, cash
- Check the car’s details and driver’s details
- Share your ride

title: PayPay AO
description:
PAYPAY is committed to providing "inclusive and fast" third party mobile payment solutions for e-commerce in Africa. Our vision is to "make finance more inclusive and make payment more convenient".
In addition to providing basic functions such as safe and fast recharge, transfer, and withdrawal, as long as the payee is a PAYPAY user, you can easily pay for goods and services through our mobile payment application.
You must have an account to send and receive payments. If the payee does not have a PAYPAY account, you can easily register one. Registering an account is free!
