title: Pinterest
description:
On Pinterest, find inspiration for whatever you’re into. Explore billions of ideas to turn your dreams into reality: Finding easy recipes for cozy weeknight dinners? 🥘 Discovering the secret to the perfect winter glow? ✨ Exploring ways to make your home more homey? 🛋 Creating a life you love? 

It's Possible.

Why wait? Download today to discover endless possibilities.

Bring your next great idea to life with Pinterest. Whether you’re dreaming up a new home DIY project, looking for decorative ideas to spruce up your office or searching for tattoo design inspiration, Pinterest is full of images and videos to help make your ideas happen.  

Save, organize and share your Pins 📌 

 - Stumble upon something you love? Save your favorite ideas so they’re easy to find.

 - Starting a creative collection? Organize Pins into stylistic theme boards you can come back to whenever creativity calls. 

 - Found the perfect Pin for a friend? Send it to someone you know or share it in a message to pass the inspiration around.

 - Got your own ideas? Upload images straight to the Pinterest app and create your own Pins.

Shopping inspired by you 🛍️

 - Browse through a daily discovery feed that’s full of your favorite things.

 - Connect with the stores and innovators that speak to your aesthetic. 

 - Shop for the perfect house plant, unique fashion pieces, your dream kitchenware or whatever you’re into.
 
 - Go straight from your feed to store checkout in just a few taps. 

Daily DIY tutorials ▶️

 - Discover quick video tutorials in your feed and learn something new every day.

 - Organize videos into beautiful boards and save ideas for future projects.

 - Get inspiration for DIY home improvement projects, makeup tutorials, delicious dinner recipes, fashion tips and so much more. 

Bring your dream home to life 🏠

 - Discover new home decor ideas to inspire your next DIY project. 

 - Learn how to transform your home space with stunning design ideas and innovative storage solutions. 

 - Click through Pins and see where to shop for the perfect products to complete your home DIY project,
 
 - Keep up with the latest interior design trends and follow leading designers. 

Tattoo inspiration 🎨

 - Traditional, stick and poke, micro, realistic portraits—find ideas for your next tattoo project on Pinterest.

 - Follow famous tattoo artists and discover new styles.

 - Share your tattoo ideas with friends and family. 

A worldwide creative community 🌎

 - Connect with other creators and take inspiration from every corner of the world.
 
 - Use the search bar to find a person or business that inspires you and discover all the ideas they create— from tattoo artists, graphic design experts, celebrity chefs and more. 

 - Invite other people on Pinterest to collaborate on group boards and grow your creative network.

Try Pinterest for business 👩‍💻 

 - From everyday content creators to major brands, businesses on Pinterest are here to set up shop and engage with customers. 

 - Sync information from your website to image and video Pins to give customers more info about your products.

 - Let customers save Pins or boards directly from your site to the Pinterest app.

 - Create image and video Pins to show the world what you’re about and stand out from other brands 

Terms & Conditions: Your use of this application is governed by the Pinterest General Terms of Use https://policy.pinterest.com/en/terms-of-service and the Pinterest Privacy Policy https://policy.pinterest.com/en/privacy-policy.

recentChanges: Every week we polish up the Pinterest app to make it faster and better than ever. Tell us if you like this newest version at https://help.pinterest.com/contact
comments: The pins are super good and very useful and informative .. It is a cool source of multiple ideas and unique inspiration. Just one drawback is the chat interface .. it does not show whether the person whom you want to talk to is active or not, it does not allow you to delete your messages and does not support sending images. It would be good if you improve it ..

I don't ever write reviews but I felt this app needed one. I've used Pinterest for around 6 years and it was one of my favorite apps ever. However, slowly there have been ads taking over the app, and as of today it's impossible to actually scroll through and find something good. It is completely full of ads. You could scroll for 10 minutes and only see 10 posts related to your search, but 40 ads along the way. Love the app but I can't find anything anymore but ads.

Good app, but sometimes it glitches. For instance, I'll be scrolling through some images and all of a sudden one of the images will be cropped halfway and another image will appear on the other half and it will be slanted. I find it very strange and I hope it will be fixed soon since I had this problem in around January, and despite all the updates, this still hasn't been fixed.

I love this app and have used it for years, but I've noticed it's gotten more and more ads. It's not like they are unskippable which is good. It's just the app has felt more like ads with posts sprinkled in on the main page. Also after every time I download a picture, it pops up with contacts and friends on Pinterest to quickly send it to them but I don't want to do that 😅 it's easy to skip but still does it have to pop up every single time? Can't I justtap send if I want to send it to someone

I love Pinterest and I use it daily! However, there is one glitch that I've noticed, when you click on a pin it will show the image outside of the app(sort of) and you can't interact with it or anything. It's fixable by simply restarting the app but it's just annoying. Otherwise, I love the app and it's been great information, inspiration and opinions from others. edit: I haven't encountered the glitch since I wrote this review.. maybe it heard me 😭

title: Shorts VotTak: Short Video App
description:
In social networks, shorts are crucial in content creation, and VotTak, as a short video app, leads this trend. This app excels in creating shorts, perfect for sharing a short story or multiple short stories, thanks to its efficient short cuts in editing. VotTak stands out in the video maker field, simplifying the process to make videos. Its video editor and video audio editor features are ideal for those looking to make video with music. Its ability to create compelling reels video content encourages users to make videos that captivate audiences.

The short video app VotTak transforms content sharing with shorts leading the way. The shortcut to effective communication often lies in a well-shot short video. Proper form during exercises is the most important aspect of sculpting toned legs and a tight butt. Usually the exercises need to target three major muscle groups - butt, thighs and leg muscles.

title: Portuguese Dictionary Offline
description:
The free offline Portuguese dictionary application explains the meaning of Portuguese words! Definitions are based on Portuguese Wiktionary. This is a monolingual Portuguese dictionary: words must be entered in Portuguese language.

Features
♦ More than 71000 words and large number of inflected forms
♦ Fast as it works offline, internet is used only when a word is not found in the offline dictionary
♦ You can leaf through words using your finger (swipe right and left)
♦ Easy and functional user interface, optimized also for tablets
♦ Bookmarks and search history with option to backup your bookmarks
♦ Crossword help: the symbol ? can be used in place of single unknown letter. The symbol * can be used in place of any group of letters.
♦ Random search button (shuffle), useful to learn new words
♦ Compatible with Moon+ Reader and FBReader

Your settings
♦ Black and white themes with user defined text colors (press menu-->select Settings-->click on Theme)
♦ Optional Floating Action Button (FAB) supporting one of the following actions: Search, History, Favorites, Random search and Share option
♦ Persistent Search option to get automatic keyboard at startup
♦ Text to speech options
♦ Number of items in history
♦ Customable font size and line spacing

You can post your suggestions on http://goo.gl/Xkk6d
♦ Question & Answers: http://goo.gl/UnU7V
♦ No voice output? Please follow instructions here: http://goo.gl/axXwR.
♦ Information about permissions used by the application can be found here: http://goo.gl/AsqT4C

Word pronunciation works only if voice data for portuguese have been correctly installed in your phone (Text-to-speech engine). 

In case Moon+ Reader does not list my dictionary: open pop-up "Customize dictionary" and select "Open dictionary directly when Long-Tap on a word"

⚠ An offline dictionary needs memory. In case your device has low memory, please consider to use the online dictionary: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=livio.dictionary

Information for application developers:
✔ This application provides Dictionary API for 3rd party developers, please read further details: http://thesaurus.altervista.org/dictionary-android

Permissions:
This application requires the following permissions:
♢ INTERNET - to retrieve the definition of unknown words
♢ WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (aka Photos/Media/Files) - to backup configuration and bookmarks

Send any images in any format (jpg, webp, png, etc.) from your phone as WhatsApp stickers. Create and customize your own stickers and sticker packs, and share them with everyone you want.

It's simple and easy to use; you can easily add pictures in any format to your sticker packs, such as personal photos, downloaded pictures and saved stickers.

There's no need to download a bunch of apps for different sticker packs, this all-in-one sticker maker meets all your needs!

comments: Overall, it is a good app. One bug in sticker editing persist. Here is how to reproduce it: start creation of a new regular sticker, select cutout and tap on AI cutout tool. After the AI selection try to adjust it (use eraser and repair tools simultaneously) . Worth mentioning that I also zoomed in while doing this, and did a lot of back and forward with eraser and repair tool. The bug happens when you try to use the undo button, everything gets messed up, and redo does not bring your back.

Seems to work without much effort, but it's overloaded with ads, ad nauseam... there's one popping up every time you tap on a button to do anything. It's completely annoying and unusable. I do understand the need to monetize a free app, but this is beyond comprehension.  Uninstalling now, do not recommend at all, unless you are not appreciative of your own time and don't mind to waste it.

I recently downloaded the Sticker Maker for WhatsApp, and it has exceeded my expectations! The user-friendly interface makes creating custom stickers a breeze. The app offers a wide range of customization options, allowing me to express my creativity. The process of turning my photos & videos into stickers was smooth, and the quality of the stickers is excellent. I love how seamlessly they integrate into WhatsApp conversations. This app has added a fun and personalized touch to my chats.

Good app. Would have been better if you included a "select all" option in the 'Multiple' choice, for those of us with hundreds of stickers to make from photos and GIFs. Also the animated category lacks "multiple" choice. Work on that. Overall, this is a great app.

overall great, but one ANNOYING issue been able to make stickers for most scenarios (awesome) but, whenever I make a sticker, it saves the image to my camera roll. this is a minor thing, but quickly uses up storage if you forget to delete to 2nd save image of your sticker.

recentChanges:
We're always looking for new ways to improve our app. This time around we:

-Fixed some bugs related to our user experience
-Improved our app's performance so you can shop more seamlessly
-Added 'Choice' items with better prices & better services.

Leave a review & let us know what you'd like us to update next!
comments: The app is well written and fast. However, there is no direct access to "Picks" like there is for "Cart" and it is not very explicit about some functions. Cart, Acct, etc., should be displayed on the bottom of every screen. I also have not found how to redisplay the offers that appear when we initially open the app. I feel that from the items to order screen, one should be able to go to the full item's description with all the pics, not just the summary and one pic.

On the one hand, I've had various problems with deliveries and bad products. On the other hand, their customer service solved them all, and I was always reimbursed. The app itself works well enough, except for the blatant false advertising of discounts (like saying a product is -60%, when it's obviously not true). That rubs me the wrong way. Overall, it's worth a try.

Our experience is merchant after merchant...that fails to deliver. They use various tactics to lying about shipping info, reroute shipments, screw up tracking numbers, report after a week they don't have inventory, and more. Illegal listings, where they show a main image, describe it accurately in the title, and show a price. BUT go into listing to buy or put in cart and they suddenly show other items to pick from, where the other items are the price listed and jack up the price on main item.

I have only placed one order so far, but everything was good on their end. I did receive my beautiful diamond painting. However, I had trouble on my end, my bank card didn't go through on a couple of other items that I wanted to order, not even through PayPal. Luckily the item that I wanted most, the bank card worked. I suppose the bank didn't let it go through for security reasons, transactions to a different country was giving me issues. I definitely want to order more things.

Been using this site for years, but the recent UI update is terrible. There isn't a section on each item for reviews anymore and they've removed the number showing how many of an item is left when in your cart on low stock items instead showing "Almost sold out". Meaning you need to go to the store page for any useful information. It's very obvious they've decided it's more important to rush people to buy then have them make well informed decisions when purchasing.

title: DJ Music mixer - DJ Mix Studio
description:
DJ Music Mixer - DJ Mixer is an amazing virtual DJ mixer and music mixer with sound effects, Equalizer & Bass Booster to remix songs, make beat music & record mix. With DJ Music Mixer - Djing Mixer, you can create and customize your music mixes with ease, using a range of powerful mixing tools, effects, and loops. 💯💯
DJ Music Mixer - Dj Remix is a powerful and intuitive music mixing app that is designed for both professional and novice DJs. You can use it as a standard free Dj Music, to create & rap the song as you wanted. 🎺🎧
DJ Music Mixer - Dj Remix Pro is optimized for the latest mobile devices, providing smooth and seamless mixing on any device. Mix your favorite music and add effects to it easily with a real DJ player with two DJ cross-disc. Explore music tracks with different loops and a place where you can edit sounds. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just getting started, our app has everything you need to create amazing DJ mixes. 
If you are looking for an amazing virtual DJ mixer and music mixer app, if you want to create your music for the party? This excellent music DJ mixer makes it easy for creative people and music lovers like you!

🎶 Professional DJ Music Mixer & Beat Music
- Use a professional mixer for more flexible mixing
- Real crossfader with 2 virtual mixer TURNTABLES
- Set up to 6 Hot Cues on each deck. Loops from 1/64 to 128
- Intuitive interface with direct and quick access to all the essential features
- Designed by pro DJs

🎹 DJ Mixer & 3D Remix sound effects
- Built-in sounds on music remix pads. 28 free sample Packs: DJing, Gunshot, Boom, Clap, Boing, Scratch...
- EQ Five bands equalizer& Bass Boost
- Adjustable mix volume and Pitch

🎙 High-Quality Audio Mix Recorder
- HD recording of your mixes and scratch routines in .mp3 format
- Record your music mixes with the Microphone or Internal Audio on Android 10
- High-quality uninterrupted DJ song

🎼 Advanced DJ Music Mixer - Dj Remix Audio Features:
- DJ mixer with sound effects, songs remix and DJ music maker
- Access to all the music stored on your device from TRACKS, ARTISTS, ALBUMS, FOLDERS
- Add music to playlist music library to easy importing
- Push The Buttons To Play Cool Sounds
- Wide audio spectrum for optimized beats detection
- Rotate disc and play remix, backward or forward
- Simple equalizer to control turntable effects
- High-quality circles - DJ mixer player app

DJ Music Mixer - Dj Remix Studio is the ultimate virtual DJing tool to mix music and songs and play DJ with ease. Totally FREE Download DJ Music Mixer - Dj Remix and start remixing tracks like a pro! Simply select your favorite genres and use the pads to create beats and songs! DJ Maker allows you to experiment, mix styles, create wonderful melodies, and master your beat making talents step by step. Manipulate the music by adding DJ sound effects, using music equalizers, and more, come make your live DJ remix music!

comments: Probably fun for someone to play around on, but if you ever djed, or intend to dj, this is absolute garbage. Incorrectly labelled items that don't work as they should, almost no accuracy/responsiveness to input, and stuff simply not doing what it should. I'm sure you could make it work, but it would be like learning keyboard with the notes in the wring positions.

I love this app. It is easy to use, great quality sound and the interface is quite awesome, considering the fact that it is used on a phone. It also gives you many options, which I have yet to use, but it rocks as far as dj mixing.

Good but there's more to improve.. I'll just state one for now.. when recording using internal audio, i noticed the transition and volume controls in between songs aren't applied when you play it back
I really like it,i mean that's a professionnal music mixer but when i boost the volume,the sound variate,discreasing and increasing.

Below par for me spend a considerable amount of time recording a mix only to get a recording of God knows Wat at the end. Cannot spin the disc freely for fast rewind. When selecting music you have to start all over each time you enter a folder with hundreds of files. Hassling

comments: The app allows you to browse for any music, via multiple servers, which is impressive as well as having a music download feature. It has a fluid UI, and only some ads. However, when I downloaded a song, and tried to play it, it redirected me to another app on the playstore, which gave me the impression that I was cheated. I hope they fix the download feature. In addition, sometimes, it says "play error" when I'm trying to play a song, so that also should be fixed. Hence, the missing two stars.

Even though ads are there pestering asking you to watch them before you download anything, don't give up, be patience and watch. Patience pays. Enjoy it.

This is a free journaling app. Use pattern lock, digit PIN, or fingerprint lock to protect the security of your secret thoughts and daily notes.

This app is amazing! A 5 star review and no add mostly at all. The perfect way to safe your memories. But I have one problem. Sometimes when I go to the app I find out some of my memories are missing. But to be honest I recommend this to anyone's who has a diary and can't bother writing in it

This app is very good :) there are many options for font and background. Once you'll start to write you'll have an amazing experience! I just wanted to state that there are multiple options when online, please add more options for offline also. At the last I would say that it's excellent.

Nice UI and easy to use. It has all the great features for a great diary app: Cloud Backup, security login and Customization. Oh the customization features are awesome! Only suggestion would be an option be able to pin some days/notes/entries to the top for easy access or a section for pinned/starred or favorite entries/days. Overall great app, the best and totally deserves a 5Star rating! 💯⭐

"Fantastic diary app! User-friendly interface, seamless navigation, and robust features make journaling a delight. The customization options and security features enhance the overall experience. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a reliable and enjoyable digital diary."💯🥰

title: ShortTV - Watch Dramas & Shows
description:
Welcome to the Exciting World of ShortTV - your personal hub for all kinds of engaging Short Dramas!

The hot werewolf dramas are currently being released online, check them out right now~
🐺Forbidden desires：Alpha's Love: The taboo romance between Adrian and Chloe in multiple identities.
🐺Reborn to Revenge: The Betrayed Luna: Melinda met her mate, Nelson, under a surprising situation... When she tried to walk away from some troubles, the instinctive desire for Nelson stayed her.
🐺My Personal Lycan King: One night, the mysterious man leaned forward and whispered seductively in her ear: "Hello, mate. Let's fall in love."

Exclusively popular boss-produced dramas, which one is your favorite?
👨Supreme Emperor: Emperor experienced life and delivered takeout, but was unexpectedly divorced by eight aristocratic families!
👩The Female Janitor Revealed as a Hidden Tycoon: Cleaning aunt or CEO, which one is her real identity?

Step into the realm of ShortTV, where an array of engaging short dramas and movies awaits your exploration. Immerse yourself in a diverse range of episodes and elevate your drama experience to new heights.

Indulge in a Tapestry of Genres
With ShortTV, you'll relish an assortment of genres spanning drama, romance, suspense, and thrilling mysteries. Embark on time-travel adventures, unravel enigmatic cases, or get swept away in the fantasy of romance with a pretend billionaire. Our collection of stories is as vast as your imagination!

Lose Yourself in Miniature Dramas
In just minutes, you'll be completely absorbed in these enthralling short narratives, igniting your passion for drama like never before.

Unveiling Exclusive Selection
ShortTV proudly presents a meticulously curated assortment of short plays. Each episode is carefully crafted, brimming with creativity, emotion, and depth, designed to transport you effortlessly into a multitude of imaginative realms.

Here's What Awaits You on ShortTV:

- An Array of Genres
 From inspirational comebacks to enigmatic time-travel adventures, from the allure of ancient tales to modern love stories, ShortTV caters to every drama preference you desire.


- Tailored Recommendations
Our smart recommendation system ensures you easily find shows tailored to your tastes.

- Effortless Viewing Experience
 With each short drama lasting just minutes, you can seamlessly enjoy them during your commute, breaks, or moments of leisure.

- Exclusive Original Content
Engage with bite-sized, drama-packed original shows that will keep you coming back for more. The entertainment never stops!

- Always Fresh
Stay up-to-date with real-time updates, ensuring a steady stream of the hottest short dramas and movies. Discover new favorites every week!

- Your One-Stop Platform
ShortTV simplifies your viewing journey by providing a unified platform, eliminating the inconvenience of switching between sources.

- Visual Brilliance
Delight in high-definition visuals that capture every detail, creating an immersive feast for your eyes.

Embrace ShortTV as your gateway to the world of short dramas and movies, where limitless possibilities await. Download now and embark on an exhilarating journey through a universe of captivating short dramas, immersing yourself in the drama-watching experience!

comments: This is UNBELIEVABLY Expensive! I'm going to "try" to finish the story I started, and then I will be uninstalling it! Also, for as much money as it costs to watch this. There should NOT be ads!! If we could continue to watch ads in order to finish the story, that would be fine, but you can't. After a few times, you're cut off from watching ads to finish, and you have to pay. The prices are INSANE! I can take my husband, son, and myself to a nice movie theater for that price!

Needs a lot of improvements. Many of the settings such as 'disabling auto-lock does not work' The system will take coins before any free points. It is expensive, but that can be expected of Chinese-based apps such as this and reading apps. The adds are horrible. There seem to be adds upon adds. Many times, when an add ends and you exit, you can still hear the add in the background. You have to close the app and reopen it, to a new add. And even then that might not solve the issue.

The app makes purchases for you. I have disabled it, but it continues to do so. It's upsetting if you want to preview something, but it continues and spends your purchased coins. It only opens the option to disable auto unlock when you run out of coins. I have it selected to disable in my profile, but it doesn't disable it. As for the stories, I have enjoyed some. There are some obvious mispronounced words by the voice actors, but I otherwise enjoy the stories.

Really like the short stories. They have a good story line to them. The only thing that I don't like is how you have to watch an ad after so many. It cost so much to play the next the one And how many ads other than that It's great. I just sat here for probably 15 minutes. Trying to get bonus points and watch to probably 10 ads. Just to watch 3 episodes, please fix this function. A lot more people would use your app. If it wasn't like that.

I really like the app the first couple days but there are a bunch of ads. Then I started getting notifications on my phone and they would override everything else. I checked my permission settings and none were granted. You can't click on anything when their notifications pop up and this is often. At first I could watch my liked videos & I just have to watch an ad to see the next one. It won't let me see anymore without paying now and I have paid twice. This sucks . The actors are pretty good!

title: Document Reader: PDF, DOC, XLS
description:
Document Reader is an all-in-one file viewer that helps you read and manage all formats of office files easily. PDF, WORD, EXCEL, PPT, TXT, etc. all supported.

It's very easy to use, and compatible with all office formats. Just open it, you'll see all your documents well organized in folders for quick search and view. Open Word, read PDF, manage all files in one place easily!

Why choose Document Reader?
👏 Support all formats - PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLXS, PPT, TXT, PNG, JPG, RTF, etc.
👏 All document viewer/office viewer
👏 Read all documents anywhere, anytime with just one click
👏 Simple and clear file lists, easy to search and manage files
👏 Bookmark documents for quick access
👏 No internet required, read documents offline

Download this simple, fast, lightweight all document reader now, and you'll get a PDF reader, Word/Excel viewer, PPT viewer, all in one!

Document Reader can work as: 

📕 PDF Reader/PDF Viewer
- Zoom in/zoom out pages while reading
- Jump to the page you want directly
- Switch from landscape and portrait reading mode freely
- Easily print and share PDFs

📘 Word Reader
- Handy document viewer for all DOC, DOCX, and DOCS files
- Easily find your target file through quick search feature
- Sort all documents by file path, size, name, last edit date, etc.
- Simple and elegant interface

📈 Excel/Text Viewer
- Quickly open XLS, XLSX, TXT files and search out the data you want
- A simple and straightforward way to read spreadsheets on your device

🔍 PPT Viewer
- Viewing PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX files has never been easier
- Fast and stable performance, HD quality

➡️ More features on the way…
✔️ Image to PDF converter
✔️ Edit documents freely
✔️ Support more document formats, RAR, ZIP, MOBI, HTML, etc.
✔️ Night mode
✔️ Search text within documents
…

Try Document Reader now and you can read, edit and manage documents in all formats on the go!

Thank you for choosing Document Reader. 💗 We welcome all feedback and suggestions. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us at allreaderappfeedback@gmail.com.

comments: Only works in 1 of every 10 or so attempts...and it would take a while to open a file if successful. UPDATE: The issue happens to all sorts of docx files (plain text), so I don't think I need to send a sample to the developers.

I edited my review again to give it a 2 because they said I can email them my PowerPoint document so that they can open it for me since the app doesn't want to open it because of a "parsing issue". I've emailed them the document to open it for me and they didn't do as they said they would.

This app is very much effective in performing the function it is meant to. It is decently quick and scans and views all documents as it should. The only downside would be the ads, but then of course I as all other users should; understand that ads are necessary to help fund the app. There really isn't much to say, the app is a 5 star, but I'll give it a 4 because of the ads.

I love that I can open any type of document on the application. It saves me from having a collection of apps for each- and-every file format thus saving space on my phone. Thanks so much. Am loving it all the way

How did this even get on my phone? A very deceptive icon to make you believe it's part of the Microsoft Suite? A $5 charge for ad purchases? Can't even open it without being bombarded by ads? Puh-lease. Un-installed instantly.

title: Photo Video Maker With Music
description:
Video Maker With Music & Photo is an easy-to-use, full-featured free HD video editor and video maker with photos, background music, magic effects, stylish templates, Animated Video Editor, text, audio, transition effects, animated stickers, blur background and more. Just simply select your photos and videos to make HD videos without watermark, festival video status, anniversary photo status, birthdays, weddings, Valentine's Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve and other precious moments for YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, WhatsApp, and Facebook.

Video Maker With Music & Photo is also the best professional photo video maker, with many wonderful video templates, moving music, beautiful frames, filters. You can use video templates for free to create creative vlogs and lyrical videos with fashion effects, cool transitions, and emoticons in one click.

Video Maker With Music & Photo is also a powerful video editing tool and photo editing tool all in one. Trim videos, compress videos, extract music from videos, edit photos, everything can be done in this powerful video editor.

🌈Top Highlights of Video Maker & Video Editor
✓ Make Video Movie and Photo Slideshow with music.
✓ Various video templates: Christmas, birthday, love, wedding, vintage, movies, family, ....
✓Multi-Layer editing, add music, sound effects, glitch effects, stickers & text
✓ Easy to Trim, Cut, Split, Merge, Compress, Convert Videos.
✓4K export, save HD video without quality loss
✓Export video in any ratio, 1:1, 16:9, 3:4, 3:2, etc.
✓ Share videos to Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter, Messenger, Mail, and more.
✓ FREE 100% & No Watermark! 

✨All-in-one Video Editor & Photo Slideshow Maker
- Use elaborate themes to create music video, slideshow or vlog instantly.
- 200+ popular fully licensed music, and you can add local songs from your device too. 
- Adjust music volume, use music fade in/ fade out option.
- 1500+ animated stickers and emoji. Aesthetics, doodle, birthdays, neon, etc.
- 30+ text styles and fonts to create artistic subtitles.
- Add stunning filters to make your video different.

🌷Professional Video Editing tools
- Split or merge video, convert video into MP3 file, collage and loop video clips easily.
- Zoom in or out. Let your audience focus on the region you want.
- 60+ awesome transitions. Combine two clips with transition effects.
- Doodle on video, draw anything you like on the screen.
- Use video reverse to make funny video or original vlog.
- Blurred background and speed adjustment features available.
- Fantastic Materials Center: Themes/filters/stickers/gif images/memes/emojis/fonts/sound effects/FX and more.

🌵Powerful Photo Edit
- Edit Photo, add text, stickers, filters, crop photos
- Animal, blur effect, cutout effect, love effect, mirror effect, magician effect
- 100+ Stylized templates including Film, Magazine, Ripped Paper
- Adjust brightness, contrast, saturation, hue, etc.

The top Video Maker With Music & Photo helps you create videos with various cool effects and music to make your videos more exciting. Come and download, record your special moments and  share to YouTube, Instagram, Tik Tok, Facebook, Messenger, Whatsapp, Twitter.
